column4: hello! I'm having troubles booting the install cd. when I select install I get a blinking cursor. Any ideas on what could be problem? I checked the md5 of the iso and it matches
I've checked AHCI/IDE settings and everything.. could it be a SATA cdrom? I get the same blinking cursor when i try to click "check CD for defects"
try hitting F6 at the boot screen, then change "quiet splash" in the input box to "nosplash"
